item.description:
Tuesday, APRIL 13, at BRUTOLE RESTAURANT, RTE 1 NORTH, at the junction of Rte. 114, Danvers.
781-283-0400.
Complimentary buffet.
6-9 PM. www.se-4u.com.
Numerous free door prizes. For single professionals, 35-60 years old.
Free parking.
OPEN TO THE PUBLIC.
Cost is $15 in advance, $20 at the door. Call (781)446-0234 for info or reservations.
Proper business dress required, ties & jackets required for men, business or party finery for women also required.
EVERYONE WHO PAYS IN ADVANCE RECEIVES A COMPLIMENTARY COCKTAIL COUPON FOR $6.

THIS IS THE BEST WAY TO SOCIALIZE & NETWORK WITH GREAT PEOPLE FOR BUSINESS OR ROMANCE.

SPONSORED BY 'THE SINGLE EXECUTIVES CLUB' AND 'THE SINGLE CEO CLUB'.
item.how_to_find_us: ASK FOR PAM AT THE DOOR.
item.name: "BOSTON AFTER DARK" COCKTAIL PARTY
